share on x el edwin and memorie leejun 11 at 8:53 pm lit a candle in memory of mary will barentine. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x kd kay dorsey. jun 11 at 8:10 pm lit a candle in memory of mary will barentine. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x gc george and nadine conner. jun 11 at 8:04 pm lit a candle in memory of mary will barentine. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jg jean ann gregory. jun 11 at 7:25 pm i am so sorry for your loss. she was a sweet lady. and also a good teacher. i will be praying for your family. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x js joe, janet, and olivia sercer. jun 11 at 7:11 pm lit a candle in memory of mary will barentine. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x dg deborah gibbs. jun 11 at 6:48 pm so sorry for the loss of your mom. she was such a wonderful lady. she taught myself, my sister, my son and my daughter in school. we all loved mrs. barentine. may god bless you and your family. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x ww wayne and vicky williamson. jun 11 at 6:17 pm lit a candle in memory of mary will barentine. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x de dale fanilu eason. jun 11 at 4:56 pm the sweetest teacher that ever taught me. rest in peace, your time here is done and you did it well. you will truly be missed. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... currently no events are scheduled. wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe frazier & son funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of mary will barentine send comfort to the barentine family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! pv penny & clark vaughn. jun 11 at 10:45 pm ronnie & family. so sorry for your loss. mrs. barentine was a sweet and wonderful lady. i always enjoyed her visits at the extension office. she will be missed by many. praying that god will give you strength and peace at this difficult time. comment share comment share facebook twitter
